tags.name: lorem-data
tags.description:
`lorem-data`
an accessible expand collapse

### Styling

`<lorem-data>` provides the following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--lorem-data-margin` | margin around lorem-data | 15px 0
`--lorem-data-border` | border around lorem-data | 1px solid
`--lorem-data-horizontal-padding` | horizontal padding inside lorem-data | 16px
`--lorem-data-horizontal-padding-left` | left padding inside lorem-data | `--lorem-data-horizontal-padding`
`--lorem-data-horizontal-padding-right` | right padding inside lorem-data | `--lorem-data-horizontal-padding`
`--lorem-data-vertical-padding` | vertical padding inside lorem-data | 16px
`--lorem-data-horizontal-padding-top` | top padding inside lorem-data | `--lorem-data-vertical-padding`
`--lorem-data-horizontal-padding-bottom` | bottom padding inside lorem-data | --lorem-data-vertical-padding
`--lorem-data-border-between` | border between lorem-data heading and content | --lorem-data-border
`--lorem-data-heading-font-weight` | font-weight for lorem-data heading | bold
`--lorem-data-heading-color` | text color for lorem-data heading | unset
`--lorem-data-heading-background-color` | background-color for lorem-data heading | unset
`--lorem-data-overflow-y` | override default overflow behavior | hidden
`--lorem-data-max-height` | override maximum height of collapse section | 200000000000vh, so that aanimation effect works

Events:

  * `lorem-data-attached` - Fires when constructed, so that parent radio group can listen for it.

  * `lorem-data-detached` - Fires when detatched, so that parent radio group will no longer listen for it.

  * `toggle` - Fires when toggled.

  * `lorem-data-toggle` - Deprecated. Fires when toggled.

  * `expand` - Fires when expanded.

  * `collapse` - Fires when collapsed.

  * `lorem-data-click` - Fires when clicked.

Attributes:

  * `icon-expanded` {`string`} - icon when expanded

  * `label-expanded` {`string`} - optional label for the button when expanded

  * `tooltip-expanded` {`string`} - optional tooltip for the button when expanded

  * `accordion` {`boolean`} - accordion-style: whole header acts as button? default is just icon.

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - is disabled?

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - icon when expanded

  * `icon` {`string`} - icon for the button

  * `label` {`string`} - label for the button

  * `tooltip` {`string`} - tooltip for the button

Properties:

  * `iconExpanded` {`string`} - icon when expanded

  * `labelExpanded` {`string`} - optional label for the button when expanded

  * `tooltipExpanded` {`string`} - optional tooltip for the button when expanded

  * `accordion` {`boolean`} - accordion-style: whole header acts as button? default is just icon.

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - is disabled?

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - icon when expanded

  * `icon` {`string`} - icon for the button

  * `label` {`string`} - label for the button

  * `tooltip` {`string`} - tooltip for the button

attributes.description:
`icon-expanded` {`string`} - icon when expanded

Property: iconExpanded

attributes.name: label-expanded
attributes.description:
`label-expanded` {`string`} - optional label for the button when expanded

Property: labelExpanded

Property: tooltipExpanded

attributes.name: accordion
attributes.description:
`accordion` {`boolean`} - accordion-style: whole header acts as button? default is just icon.

Property: accordion

Default: false

attributes.description:
`disabled` {`boolean`} - is disabled?

Property: disabled

Default: false

attributes.description:
`expanded` {`boolean`} - icon when expanded

Property: expanded

Default: false

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description:
`icon` {`string`} - icon for the button

Property: icon

Default: icons:expand-more

attributes.name: label
attributes.description:
`label` {`string`} - label for the button

Property: label

Default: expand / collapse

attributes.name: tooltip
attributes.description:
`tooltip` {`string`} - tooltip for the button

Property: tooltip

Default: toggle expand / collapse

tags.name: lorem-data-group
tags.description:
`lorem-data-group`
a group of `lorem-data` elements

### Styling

`<lorem-data-group>` provides the following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--lorem-data-group-margin` | margin around the lorem-data-group | 15px 0

Attributes:

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - is disabled?

  * `global-options` - an array of globalProperties to override every lorem-data item
For example, {"icon": "arrow-drop-down"} would set every item's icon to "arrow-drop-down"

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - is every lorem-data item radio button?

  * `__items` {`any[]`} - is radio button

Properties:

  * `items` {`any[]`} - 

  * `accordion` - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - is disabled?

  * `expanded` - 

  * `icon` - 

  * `iconExpanded` - 

  * `label` - 

  * `labelExpanded` - 

  * `tooltip` - 

  * `tooltipExpanded` - 

  * `globalOptions` - an array of globalProperties to override every lorem-data item
For example, {"icon": "arrow-drop-down"} would set every item's icon to "arrow-drop-down"

  * `radio` {`boolean`} - is every lorem-data item radio button?

  * `__items` {`any[]`} - is radio button

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
`disabled` {`boolean`} - is disabled?

Property: disabled

Default: null

attributes.name: global-options
attributes.description:
`global-options` - an array of globalProperties to override every lorem-data item
For example, {"icon": "arrow-drop-down"} would set every item's icon to "arrow-drop-down"

Property: globalOptions

Default: [object Object]

attributes.name: radio
attributes.description:
`radio` {`boolean`} - is every lorem-data item radio button?

Property: radio

Default: false

attributes.description:
`__items` {`any[]`} - is radio button

Property: __items

Default:
